Quote.Author: James Altucher
Quote.QuoteValue: Read every sentence you write out loud. If it sounds boring, kill it

Quote.Author: James Altucher
Quote.QuoteValue: Games are all about taking risks

Quote.Author: James Altucher
Quote.QuoteValue: You're the average of the five people you spend your time with

Quote.Author: James Altucher
Quote.QuoteValue: Investing is for wealth preservation, not wealth creation, so first you have to make wealth

Quote.Author: James Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: I just thank God for all of the blessings

Quote.Author: James Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to say to you, Help yourself, so you can help someone else

Quote.Author: James Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: My expectations of other people, I double them on myself

Quote.Author: James Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: The one thing that can solve most of our problems is dancing

Quote.Author: James Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: I taught them everything they know, but not everything I know

Quote.Author: James Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not going to be joining ZZ Top. You know they can't play my stuff. It's too complicated

Quote.Author: James Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: I got a wife who likes expensive things, so she takes all the cash

Quote.Author: James Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd like to cut down on the work a little bit

Quote.Author: James Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm kidding about having only a few dollars. I might have a few dollars more

Quote.Author: James Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: I've been held responsible for taxes I know nothing about

Quote.Author: James Cash Penney
Quote.QuoteValue: Growth is never by mere chance; it is the result of forces working together

Quote.Author: James Cash Penney
Quote.QuoteValue: The best teamwork comes from men who are working independently toward one goal in unison

Quote.Author: James Cash Penney
Quote.QuoteValue: The keystone of successful business is cooperation. Friction retards progress

Quote.Author: James Cash Penney
Quote.QuoteValue: Luck is always the last refuge of laziness and incompetence

Quote.Author: James Cash Penney
Quote.QuoteValue: The well-satisfied customer will bring the repeat sale that counts

Quote.Author: James Cash Penney
Quote.QuoteValue: I do not believe in excuses. I believe in hard work as the prime solvent of life's problems

Quote.Author: James Cash Penney
Quote.QuoteValue: It is always the start that requires the greatest effort

Quote.Author: James Cash Penney
Quote.QuoteValue: Responsibilities are given to him on whom trust rests. Responsibility is always a sign of trust

Quote.Author: James Cash Penney
Quote.QuoteValue: Every man must decide for himself whether he shall master his world or be mastered by it

Quote.Author: James Cash Penney
Quote.QuoteValue: Clock watchers never seem to be having a good time

Quote.Author: James Dean
Quote.QuoteValue: Dream as if you'll live forever. Live as if you'll die today

Quote.Author: James Dean
Quote.QuoteValue: Only the gentle are ever really strong

Quote.Author: James Dean
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no way to be truly great in this world. We are all impaled on the crook of conditioning

Quote.Author: James Dean
Quote.QuoteValue: To my way of thinking, an actor's course is set even before he's out of the cradle

Quote.Author: James Dean
Quote.QuoteValue: The gratification comes in the doing, not in the results

Quote.Author: James Dean
Quote.QuoteValue: My purpose in life does not include a hankering to charm society

Quote.Author: James Dean
Quote.QuoteValue: Being a good actor isn't easy. Being a man is even harder. I want to be both before I'm done

Quote.Author: James Dean
Quote.QuoteValue: The only greatness for man is immortality

Quote.Author: James Dean
Quote.QuoteValue: Trust and belief are two prime considerations. You must not allow yourself to be opinionated

Quote.Author: James Dean
Quote.QuoteValue: Racing is the only time I feel whole

Quote.Author: James Dyson
Quote.QuoteValue: As an engineer I'm constantly spotting problems and plotting how to solve them

Quote.Author: James Dyson
Quote.QuoteValue: The computer dictates how you do something, whereas with a pencil you're totally free

Quote.Author: James Dyson
Quote.QuoteValue: If robots are to clean our homes, they'll have to do it better than a person

Quote.Author: James Dyson
Quote.QuoteValue: Engineers are behind the cars we drive, the pills we pop and the way we power our homes

Quote.Author: James Dyson
Quote.QuoteValue: Enjoy failure and learn from it. You can never learn from success

Quote.Author: James Dyson
Quote.QuoteValue: One of the most fun inventions of my lifetime is the Mini

Quote.Author: James Dyson
Quote.QuoteValue: I like living on the edge

Quote.Author: James Dyson
Quote.QuoteValue: We should learn to live more with our climate and rely less on electricity to alter our climate

Quote.Author: James Dyson
Quote.QuoteValue: Goodness, I know nothing about nuclear energy

Quote.Author: James Dyson
Quote.QuoteValue: The wonderful thing about Apple technology is just how intuitive it is

Quote.Author: James Earl Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: More and more, when I single out the person out who inspired me most, I go back to my grandfather

Quote.Author: James Earl Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: One of the hardest things in life is having words in your heart that you can't utter

Quote.Author: James Earl Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: There's nothing I would retire for, so I won't retire

Quote.Author: James Earl Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: Speech is a very important aspect of being human. A whisper doesn't cut it

Quote.Author: James Earl Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: There is not enough magic in a bloodline to forge an instant, irrevocable bond

Quote.Author: James Earl Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: You don't build a bond without being present

Quote.Author: James Earl Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: My youngest uncle Randy and I were the first members of our entire family to ever go to college

Quote.Author: James Earl Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: I mean, my people were very, very simple. They were peasant people, you know?

Quote.Author: James Earl Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: I knew real show business from my father, who had been an actor since he left the world of boxing

Quote.Author: James Earl Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't ever want to be a sentimentalist. I prefer to be a realist. I'm not a romantic really

Quote.Author: James Hetfield
Quote.QuoteValue: There is one Metallica. We have many styles, it's called Metallica

Quote.Author: James Hetfield
Quote.QuoteValue: It's all fun and games 'till someone loses an eye, then it's just fun you can't see

Quote.Author: James Hetfield
Quote.QuoteValue: Authority pisses me off. I think everyone should be able to drink and get loud whenever they want

Quote.Author: James Hetfield
Quote.QuoteValue: I choose to live, not just exist

Quote.Author: James Hetfield
Quote.QuoteValue: Sleep my friend, and you will see that dream is my reality

Quote.Author: James Hetfield
Quote.QuoteValue: There is something powerful in Metallica, a will, a drive

Quote.Author: James Hetfield
Quote.QuoteValue: I wanted to make noise, not study theory

Quote.Author: James Hetfield
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd rather regret doing something than not doing something

Quote.Author: James Hetfield
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd like to have a beer-holder on my guitar like they have on boats

Quote.Author: James Hetfield
Quote.QuoteValue: If I hadn't had music in my life, it's quite possible I'd be dead and I'd much rather be alive

Quote.Author: James Hillman
Quote.QuoteValue: It is impossible to see the angel unless you first have a notion of it

Quote.Author: James Hillman
Quote.QuoteValue: You don't know what you're going to get into when you follow your bliss

Quote.Author: James Hillman
Quote.QuoteValue: I think we're miserable partly because we have only one god, and that's economics

Quote.Author: James Hillman
Quote.QuoteValue: We need to work on the world so it will not be so oppressive

Quote.Author: James Hillman
Quote.QuoteValue: We can't change anything until we get some fresh ideas, until we begin to see things differently

Quote.Author: James Hillman
Quote.QuoteValue: Depression opens the door to beauty of some kind

Quote.Author: James Hillman
Quote.QuoteValue: We forget that the soul has its own ancestors

Quote.Author: James Hillman
Quote.QuoteValue: It's very important for men to look downward, to the next generation

Quote.Author: James Hillman
Quote.QuoteValue: The moment the angel enters a life it enters an environment. We are ecological from day one

Quote.Author: James Hillman
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't have answers. I have questions

Quote.Author: James Joyce
Quote.QuoteValue: The actions of men are the best interpreters of their thoughts

Quote.Author: James Joyce
Quote.QuoteValue: Mistakes are the portals of discovery

Quote.Author: James Joyce
Quote.QuoteValue: No pen, no ink, no table, no room, no time, no quiet, no inclination

Quote.Author: James Joyce
Quote.QuoteValue: He found in the world without as actual what was in his world within as possible

Quote.Author: James Joyce
Quote.QuoteValue: The men that is now is only all palaver and what they can get out of you

Quote.Author: James Joyce
Quote.QuoteValue: Think you're escaping and run into yourself. Longest way round is the shortest way home

Quote.Author: James Joyce
Quote.QuoteValue: I fear those big words which make us so unhappy

Quote.Author: James Joyce
Quote.QuoteValue: A man of genius makes no mistakes; his errors are volitional and are the portals of discovery

Quote.Author: James Joyce
Quote.QuoteValue: Ireland sober is Ireland stiff

Quote.Author: James Joyce
Quote.QuoteValue: It is a symbol of Irish art. The cracked looking-glass of a servant

Quote.Author: James M. Barrie
Quote.QuoteValue: Those who bring sunshine into the lives of others cannot keep it from themselves

Quote.Author: James M. Barrie
Quote.QuoteValue: God gave us memory so that we might have roses in December

Quote.Author: James M. Barrie
Quote.QuoteValue: We never understand how little we need in this world until we know the loss of it

Quote.Author: James M. Barrie
Quote.QuoteValue: Let no one who loves be unhappy, even love unreturned has its rainbow

Quote.Author: James M. Barrie
Quote.QuoteValue: A woman can be anything the man who loves her would have her be

Quote.Author: James M. Barrie
Quote.QuoteValue: Always be a little kinder than necessary

Quote.Author: James M. Barrie
Quote.QuoteValue: Do you believe in fairies? Say quick that you believe. If you believe, clap your hands!

Quote.Author: James M. Barrie
Quote.QuoteValue: Never ascribe to an opponent motives meaner than your own

Quote.Author: James M. Barrie
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is a long lesson in humility

Quote.Author: James M. Barrie
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing is really work unless you would rather be doing something else

Quote.Author: James Madison
Quote.QuoteValue: If Tyranny and Oppression come to this land, it will be in the guise of fighting a foreign enemy

Quote.Author: James Madison
Quote.QuoteValue: Liberty may be endangered by the abuse of liberty, but also by the abuse of power

Quote.Author: James Madison
Quote.QuoteValue: The advancement and diffusion of knowledge is the only guardian of true liberty

Quote.Author: James Madison
Quote.QuoteValue: If men were angels, no government would be necessary

Quote.Author: James Madison
Quote.QuoteValue: The truth is that all men having power ought to be mistrusted

Quote.Author: James Madison
Quote.QuoteValue: A well-instructed people alone can be permanently a free people

Quote.Author: James Madison
Quote.QuoteValue: In no instance have... the churches been guardians of the liberties of the people

Quote.Author: James Madison
Quote.QuoteValue: We are right to take alarm at the first experiment upon our liberties

Quote.Author: James Madison
Quote.QuoteValue: All men having power ought to be distrusted to a certain degree

Quote.Author: James Madison
Quote.QuoteValue: No nation could preserve its freedom in the midst of continual warfare

Quote.Author: James Mattis
Quote.QuoteValue: For a sitting U.S. president to see our allies as freeloaders is nuts

Quote.Author: James Mattis
Quote.QuoteValue: PowerPoint makes us stupid

Quote.Author: James Mattis
Quote.QuoteValue: Marines don't know how to spell the word 'defeat'

Quote.Author: James Mattis
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't lose any sleep at night over the potential for failure. I cannot even spell the word

Quote.Author: James Mattis
Quote.QuoteValue: You must reward the kind of behavior that you want

Quote.Author: James Mattis
Quote.QuoteValue: There is only one 'retirement plan' for terrorists

Quote.Author: James Mattis
Quote.QuoteValue: There are going to be good days and bad days. Bottom line

Quote.Author: James Mattis
Quote.QuoteValue: Read about history, and you become aware that nothing starts with us

Quote.Author: James Mattis
Quote.QuoteValue: Ultimately, a real understanding of history means that we face nothing new under the sun

Quote.Author: James Mattis
Quote.QuoteValue: I was a Marine for 41 years, and it wasn't long enough. We enjoy putting on that uniform

Quote.Author: James Taylor
Quote.QuoteValue: The secret of life is enjoying the passage of time

Quote.Author: James Taylor
Quote.QuoteValue: Music is like a huge release of tension

Quote.Author: James Taylor
Quote.QuoteValue: Certain things in life are more important than the usual crap that everyone strives for

Quote.Author: James Taylor
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe 100 percent in the power and importance of music

Quote.Author: James Taylor
Quote.QuoteValue: That's the motivation of an artist - to seek attention of some kind

Quote.Author: James Taylor
Quote.QuoteValue: We all have to face pain, and pain makes us grow

Quote.Author: James Taylor
Quote.QuoteValue: If I were to try to identify a turning point I'd say that was it - getting clean

Quote.Author: James Taylor
Quote.QuoteValue: I collect hats. That's what you do when you're bald

Quote.Author: James Taylor
Quote.QuoteValue: I can take criticisms but not compliments

Quote.Author: James Taylor
Quote.QuoteValue: You have to choose whether to love yourself or not

Quote.Author: James Thurber
Quote.QuoteValue: A drawing is always dragged down to the level of its caption

Quote.Author: James Thurber
Quote.QuoteValue: There are two kinds of light - the glow that illuminates, and the glare that obscures

Quote.Author: James Thurber
Quote.QuoteValue: Old age is the most unexpected of all the things that can happen to a man

Quote.Author: James Thurber
Quote.QuoteValue: You can fool too many of the people too much of the time

Quote.Author: James Thurber
Quote.QuoteValue: Let us not look back in anger, nor forward in fear, but around in awareness

Quote.Author: James Thurber
Quote.QuoteValue: One martini is all right. Two are too many, and three are not enough

Quote.Author: James Thurber
Quote.QuoteValue: Well, if I called the wrong number, why did you answer the phone?

Quote.Author: James Thurber
Quote.QuoteValue: Love is what you've been through with somebody

Quote.Author: James Thurber
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no exception to the rule that every rule has an exception

Quote.Author: James Thurber
Quote.QuoteValue: The most dangerous food is wedding cake

Quote.Author: Jamie Dimon
Quote.QuoteValue: No one can forecast the economy with certainty

Quote.Author: Jamie Dimon
Quote.QuoteValue: I am struck that so many of our leaders in the U.S. forget how strong our country can be

Quote.Author: Jamie Dimon
Quote.QuoteValue: The term 'too big to fail' must be excised from our vocabulary

Quote.Author: Jamie Dimon
Quote.QuoteValue: I am not embarrassed to be a banker. I am not embarrassed to be in business

Quote.Author: Jamie Dimon
Quote.QuoteValue: All businesses tend to pass costs onto customers

Quote.Author: Jamie Dimon
Quote.QuoteValue: We are totally open kimono with regulators

Quote.Author: Jamie Dimon
Quote.QuoteValue: The best way to look at any business is from the standpoint of the clients

Quote.Author: Jamie Dimon
Quote.QuoteValue: I am a patriot: I want to help my country and help it grow

Quote.Author: Jamie Dimon
Quote.QuoteValue: As American citizens, if you believe all banks were bailed out, you would hate banks. I would, too

Quote.Author: Jamie Dimon
Quote.QuoteValue: My retirement date, every time you ask me that, I'm going to say five years. I don't want to retire

Quote.Author: Jamie Farr
Quote.QuoteValue: You know what's nice about Montreal? Not only is it a beautiful city, but you have Cuban cigars

Quote.Author: Jamie Farr
Quote.QuoteValue: I certainly don't have any airs about myself

Quote.Author: Jamie Farr
Quote.QuoteValue: I did sketch comedy for years. I've always enjoyed it

Quote.Author: Jamie Farr
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think anybody is wanting to put me back on the air. But I'm certainly out there trying

Quote.Author: Jamie Farr
Quote.QuoteValue: The third year of MASH was when I realized I was a hit

Quote.Author: Jamie Farr
Quote.QuoteValue: As a kid, I had to be funny

Quote.Author: Jamie Farr
Quote.QuoteValue: Never stay with friends or relatives. You end up living on their schedules

Quote.Author: Jamie Farr
Quote.QuoteValue: I can't imagine that I will ever be on anything like 'M*A*S*H' again

Quote.Author: Jamie Farr
Quote.QuoteValue: The dresses I wore are in the Smithsonian now

Quote.Author: Jamie Farr
Quote.QuoteValue: I was the first man to put on a dress and play it straight. That was something very fresh. Still is

Quote.Author: Jamie Oliver
Quote.QuoteValue: Stop being a vegan and start enjoying what you eat

Quote.Author: Jamie Oliver
Quote.QuoteValue: The kitchen oven is reliable, but it's made us lazy

Quote.Author: Jamie Oliver
Quote.QuoteValue: Many kids can tell you about drugs but do not know what celery or courgettes taste like

Quote.Author: Jamie Oliver
Quote.QuoteValue: The public health of five million children should not be left to luck or chance

Quote.Author: Jamie Oliver
Quote.QuoteValue: Give your kids a bloody knife and fork and let me put some fresh food in front of them they can eat

Quote.Author: Jamie Oliver
Quote.QuoteValue: In England, you're allowed to have an opinion - as long as it comes out of your mouth

Quote.Author: Jamie Oliver
Quote.QuoteValue: I could cook from quite an early age - purely because I liked it

Quote.Author: Jamie Oliver
Quote.QuoteValue: As usual, my timing is bizarrely good

Quote.Author: Jamie Oliver
Quote.QuoteValue: It's not the extremes and the treats that are the problem. It's the everyday

Quote.Author: Jamie Oliver
Quote.QuoteValue: I like ties but I prefer not to wear one when I'm nervous

Quote.Author: Jamie Wyeth
Quote.QuoteValue: The real kiss of death - particularly with my father - is the extraordinary popularity of his work

Quote.Author: Jamie Wyeth
Quote.QuoteValue: I just can't whip off a likeness of somebody

Quote.Author: Jamie Wyeth
Quote.QuoteValue: As a child, I always wanted to live on a boat

Quote.Author: Jamie Wyeth
Quote.QuoteValue: The things that I paint are things that I know very well

Quote.Author: Jamie Wyeth
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a terrible technician, and I have a very hard time painting

Quote.Author: Jamie Wyeth
Quote.QuoteValue: I learned from a longtime farmer that pigs enjoy soothing music

Quote.Author: Jamie Wyeth
Quote.QuoteValue: I paint every day. I really have no hobbies. That's all I do

Quote.Author: Jamie Wyeth
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing is more uninteresting than completely knowing somebody, being totally at ease

Quote.Author: Jamie Wyeth
Quote.QuoteValue: To me, this was an oxymoron, doing a painting of a dancer. Dancers are always moving

Quote.Author: Jamie Wyeth
Quote.QuoteValue: Dance looks absurd on film, I think, like little puppets moving around

Quote.Author: Jane Fonda
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a confidence about my life that comes from standing tall on my own two feet

Quote.Author: Jane Fonda
Quote.QuoteValue: It's never too late - never too late to start over, never too late to be happy

Quote.Author: Jane Fonda
Quote.QuoteValue: We're not meant to be perfect. It took me a long time to learn that

Quote.Author: Jane Fonda
Quote.QuoteValue: A man has every season while a woman only has the right to spring

Quote.Author: Jane Fonda
Quote.QuoteValue: To be a revolutionary you have to be a human being. You have to care about people who have no power

Quote.Author: Jane Fonda
Quote.QuoteValue: Telling lies and showing off to get attention are mistakes I made that I don't want my kids to make

Quote.Author: Jane Fonda
Quote.QuoteValue: But the whole point of liberation is that you get out. Restructure your life. Act by yourself

Quote.Author: Jane Fonda
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't want my wrinkles taken away - I don't want to look like everyone else

Quote.Author: Jane Fonda
Quote.QuoteValue: It's hard for women at my age in Hollywood, but I'm not discouraged

Quote.Author: Jane Fonda
Quote.QuoteValue: I was so devastated by my second divorce that I had a nervous breakdown

Quote.Author: Janis Joplin
Quote.QuoteValue: Oh Lord, won't you buy me a Mercedes Benz

Quote.Author: Janis Joplin
Quote.QuoteValue: Being an intellectual creates a lot of questions and no answers

Quote.Author: Janis Joplin
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm one of those regular weird people

Quote.Author: Janis Joplin
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't compromise yourself. You are all you've got

Quote.Author: Janis Joplin
Quote.QuoteValue: You got to get it while you can

Quote.Author: Janis Joplin
Quote.QuoteValue: Guess what, I might be the first hippie pinup girl

Quote.Author: Janis Joplin
Quote.QuoteValue: On stage, I make love to 25,000 different people, then I go home alone

Quote.Author: Janis Joplin
Quote.QuoteValue: On stage I make love to twenty five thousand people; and then I go home alone

Quote.Author: Janis Joplin
Quote.QuoteValue: I won't quit to become someone's old lady

Quote.Author: Janis Joplin
Quote.QuoteValue: My father wouldn't get us a TV, he wouldn't allow a TV in the house

Quote.Author: Jason Kidd
Quote.QuoteValue: We're going to turn this team around 360 degrees

Quote.Author: Jason Kidd
Quote.QuoteValue: I've got to play free agency out, and I've got to look at all of my options

Quote.Author: Jason Kidd
Quote.QuoteValue: I think we're going in the right direction

Quote.Author: Jason Kidd
Quote.QuoteValue: A lot of things get misinterpreted with me, I guess

Quote.Author: Jason Kidd
Quote.QuoteValue: I think if you're consistent in this league, you'll win a lot of ball games

Quote.Author: Jason Kidd
Quote.QuoteValue: I just tried to play the game the right way. As you get older, Father Time is undefeated

Quote.Author: Jason Kidd
Quote.QuoteValue: Kobe enjoys that situation. Stepping up and making the big basket or being involved in a key play

Quote.Author: Jason Kidd
Quote.QuoteValue: The business always gets in the way of basketball

Quote.Author: Jason Kidd
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a high-risk taker on the court in the sense of trying to squeeze things in there

Quote.Author: Jason Kidd
Quote.QuoteValue: I love 'Gladiator' and '300.'

Quote.Author: Jason Statham
Quote.QuoteValue: I've come from nowhere, and I'm not shy to go back

Quote.Author: Jason Statham
Quote.QuoteValue: I've never been one to run around in Speedos on the beach

Quote.Author: Jason Statham
Quote.QuoteValue: I love getting dressed up in a suit because I don't do it all the time

Quote.Author: Jason Statham
Quote.QuoteValue: I love to get behind the wheel and get competitive

Quote.Author: Jason Statham
Quote.QuoteValue: I think being a competitive diver for years helps you focus and dedicate yourself to what's needed

Quote.Author: Jason Statham
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm certainly not Tom Cruise or Brad Pitt

Quote.Author: Jason Statham
Quote.QuoteValue: I used to play a lot of racket sports, tennis and squash

Quote.Author: Jason Statham
Quote.QuoteValue: I've been unfortunate enough to be working, and recovering from a few injuries now and again

Quote.Author: Jason Statham
Quote.QuoteValue: My father used to run auctions. He's now a singer in the Canary Islands

Quote.Author: Jason Statham
Quote.QuoteValue: It's street theater. You have to make it entertaining so people don't get bored and walk away

Quote.Author: Jasper Carrott
Quote.QuoteValue: Laughter is the best medicine - unless you're diabetic, then insulin comes pretty high on the list

Quote.Author: Jasper Carrott
Quote.QuoteValue: I was never the class clown, and I've no idea where the comedy came from

Quote.Author: Jasper Carrott
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to do things I enjoy, and show business comes fifth or sixth down the line

Quote.Author: Jasper Carrott
Quote.QuoteValue: Ringo isn't the best drummer in the world. He isn't even the best drummer in the Beatles

Quote.Author: Jasper Carrott
Quote.QuoteValue: Happiness to me is simply not being unhappy

Quote.Author: Jasper Carrott
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always been sensible with my money. I can't say I'm a business genius

Quote.Author: Jasper Carrott
Quote.QuoteValue: I have that working class fear of having nothing. I've always got one eye on what's in the bank

Quote.Author: Jasper Carrott
Quote.QuoteValue: I have to confess here that I am a useless cook

Quote.Author: Jasper Carrott
Quote.QuoteValue: The impact of T.V. on our lives in general gets most things out of proportion

Quote.Author: Jasper Carrott
Quote.QuoteValue: I've played with some very famous bandits in my time on the celebrity golf circuit

Quote.Author: Jasper Johns
Quote.QuoteValue: I am not strong on perfection

Quote.Author: Jasper Johns
Quote.QuoteValue: Intention involves such a small fragment of our consciousness and of our mind and of our life

Quote.Author: Jasper Johns
Quote.QuoteValue: I am just trying to find a way to make pictures

Quote.Author: Jasper Johns
Quote.QuoteValue: Take an object. Do something to it. Do something else to it

Quote.Author: Jasper Johns
Quote.QuoteValue: Do something, do something to that, and then do something to that

Quote.Author: Jasper Johns
Quote.QuoteValue: I tend to like things that already exist

Quote.Author: Jasper Johns
Quote.QuoteValue: One likes to think that one anticipates changes in the spaces we inhabit, and our ideas about space

Quote.Author: Jasper Johns
Quote.QuoteValue: To be an artist you have to give up everything, including the desire to be a good artist

Quote.Author: Jasper Johns
Quote.QuoteValue: I love drawings, so I've always enjoyed making drawings that exist on their own

Quote.Author: Jasper Johns
Quote.QuoteValue: To me, self-description is a calamity

Quote.Author: Jawaharlal Nehru
Quote.QuoteValue: The art of a people is a true mirror to their minds

Quote.Author: Jawaharlal Nehru
Quote.QuoteValue: Culture is the widening of the mind and of the spirit

Quote.Author: Jawaharlal Nehru
Quote.QuoteValue: Failure comes only when we forget our ideals and objectives and principles

Quote.Author: Jawaharlal Nehru
Quote.QuoteValue: The only alternative to coexistence is codestruction

Quote.Author: Jawaharlal Nehru
Quote.QuoteValue: You don't change the course of history by turning the faces of portraits to the wall

Quote.Author: Jawaharlal Nehru
Quote.QuoteValue: It is only too easy to make suggestions and later try to escape the consequences of what we say

Quote.Author: Jawaharlal Nehru
Quote.QuoteValue: Let us be a little humble; let us think that the truth may not perhaps be entirely with us

Quote.Author: Jawaharlal Nehru
Quote.QuoteValue: Citizenship consists in the service of the country

Quote.Author: Jawaharlal Nehru
Quote.QuoteValue: Facts are facts and will not disappear on account of your likes

Quote.Author: Jawaharlal Nehru
Quote.QuoteValue: The person who talks most of his own virtue is often the least virtuous

Quote.Author: Jean de la Bruyere
Quote.QuoteValue: Out of difficulties grow miracles

Quote.Author: Jean de la Bruyere
Quote.QuoteValue: Two persons cannot long be friends if they cannot forgive each other's little failings

Quote.Author: Jean de la Bruyere
Quote.QuoteValue: Love and friendship exclude each other

Quote.Author: Jean de la Bruyere
Quote.QuoteValue: The sweetest of all sounds is that of the voice of the woman we love

Quote.Author: Jean de la Bruyere
Quote.QuoteValue: A position of eminence makes a great person greater and a small person less

Quote.Author: Jean de la Bruyere
Quote.QuoteValue: A vain man finds it wise to speak good or ill of himself; a modest man does not talk of himself
